Title: Image Upload and Editor Control
Description: ASP.Net 2.0/MS AJAX 1.1 Image Editor custom server control provides client-side cropping, rotation/flip, brightness/contrast/saturation enhancement with dynamically generated image preview. Accompanying Image Editor Control is a full-featured image file selection and upload custom server control for DotNetNuke v 4.6.2 and above which handles all folder (including DNN secure and database folders) and file operations with respect for DNN permissions. A DNN module is also provided to demonstrate the control's capabilities and properties. It may also be used as a stand-alone image upload and editing module.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
ASP.Net 2.0/MS AJAX 1.1 Image Editor custom server control provides client-side cropping, rotation/flip, brightness/contrast/saturation enhancement with dynamically generated image preview. Accompanying Image Editor Control is a full-featured image file selection and upload custom server control for DotNetNuke v 4.6.2 and above which handles all folder (including DNN secure and database folders) and file operations with respect for DNN permissions. A DNN module is also provided to demonstrate the control's capabilities and properties. It may also be used as a stand-alone image upload and editing module.

A live demo may be seen at http://www.wesnetdesigns.com/Projects/ImageEditor/tabid/114/Default.aspx
